# HUD::DISPLAY_CASH

## Summary
Dipslays the playes cash

## Parameters
* **BOOL** value

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
"DISPLAY_CASH(false);" makes the cash amount render on the screen when appropriate
"DISPLAY_CASH(true);" disables cash amount rendering
